name: Apocalypse Gate
text: This card is always treated as a "Omni" Spell. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can Special Summon a "Four Knight's of the Apocalypse" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY. your opponent cannot target "Four Knight's of the Apocalypse" monsters you control with card effects. Your opponent cannot activate effects in response to effects that involve or are from "Four Knight's of the Apocalypse" monster's you control.
